desc: Joy Discovers STEM - science, technology, engineering, math - and art, history, and fun in the natural world. Focus is on semi precious stones, gemstones, and how they form geologically. Also how they get to you - where they come from and who mines and prepares them.

layout.text: Bringing my kids and yours to nature.
Our Earth is amazing. Connect through touch stones, then get out and explore for more!
